meanings.definition: A type of red wine made from a dark blue grape variety.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy sipping on merlots during dinner.
meanings.sent2: The winery had a special offer on merlots this weekend.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone was impressed by the selection of merlots.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of merlots filled the room, creating a cozy atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The taste of merlots reminded me of ripe berries on a sunny day.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'merlot', referring to multiple bottles or glasses of the wine.
meanings.sent1: We bought a few merlots to share with our friends.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant's menu featured various merlots from different regions.
meanings.sent3: During the celebration, we toasted with several merlots.
meanings.sent4: The shelves were stocked with an array of merlots, tempting wine enthusiasts.
meanings.sent5: The sound of corks popping signaled the start of a merlots tasting event.
